metadata.title: CVE-2024-21204 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: PS).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.4.0 and  9.0.1 andprior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attackerwith network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts).  CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mariadb-10.3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
